columns.name: customer_id
columns.column_description: Unique identifier for each customer

columns.name: customer_name
columns.column_description: Name of the customer

columns.name: industry
columns.column_description: Industry the customer belongs to

columns.name: customer_tier
columns.column_description: Tier of the customer (e.g., 'Enterprise', 'SME')

columns.name: contact_email
columns.column_description: Primary contact email of the customer

dbo.inventory_metadata_sample.table_description: Tracks current stock levels of products in various warehouses

columns.name: inventory_id
columns.column_description: Unique identifier for each inventory record

columns.name: product_id
columns.column_description: ID of the product in this inventory record

columns.name: warehouse_id
columns.column_description: ID of the specific warehouse where stock is held

columns.name: current_stock
columns.column_description: Current quantity of the product in stock

columns.name: last_updated_date
columns.column_description: Date when the stock level was last updated

columns.name: reorder_point
columns.column_description: The stock level at which a new order should be placed

dbo.product_metadata_sample.table_description: Details about the various products in the inventory

columns.name: product_id
columns.column_description: Unique identifier for each product

columns.name: product_name
columns.column_description: Name of the product

columns.name: category
columns.column_description: Broad product category (e.g., Chemicals, Electronics)

columns.name: sub_category
columns.column_description: More specific product sub-category (e.g., Solvents)

columns.name: unit_of_measure
columns.column_description: Unit in which the product is measured (e.g., kg, units)

columns.name: standard_cost
columns.column_description: Standard cost of the product

columns.name: selling_price
columns.column_description: Selling price of the product

columns.name: weight_kg
columns.column_description: Weight of one unit of product in kilograms

columns.name: volume_m3
columns.column_description: Volume of one unit of product in cubic meters

columns.name: lifecycle_stage
columns.column_description: Stage in the product's lifecycle (e.g., 'Growth')

columns.name: criticality_level
columns.column_description: Impact of a stock-out (e.g., 'High', 'Medium', 'Low')

columns.name: minimum_stock_level
columns.column_description: Reorder point for inventory planning

columns.name: lead_time_days
columns.column_description: Standard procurement lead time in days

dbo.region_metadata_sample.table_description: Stores information about the operational regions

columns.name: region_id
columns.column_description: Unique identifier for each region

columns.name: region_name
columns.column_description: Common name of the region (e.g., North India)

columns.name: country
columns.column_description: Country where the region is located

columns.name: state_province
columns.column_description: Specific state or province within the country

columns.name: city_hub
columns.column_description: Main logistics hub city in the region/state

columns.name: avg_transit_time_days
columns.column_description: Average time for inter-state/regional transport in days

columns.name: infrastructure_index
columns.column_description: Index from 1-10 (10 being best) for infrastructure quality

columns.name: economic_impact_score
columns.column_description: Score from 1-10 (10 being high revenue/criticality)

columns.name: seasonal_risk_factor
columns.column_description: Factor for increased risk during specific seasons (e.g., monsoon)

dbo.orders_metadata_sample.table_description: Records details of customer orders and their delivery status

columns.name: order_id
columns.column_description: Unique identifier for each order

columns.name: customer_id
columns.column_description: ID of the customer who placed the order

columns.name: order_date
columns.column_description: Date the order was placed

columns.name: promised_delivery_date
columns.column_description: Date by which delivery was promised

columns.name: actual_delivery_date
columns.column_description: Actual date the order was delivered

columns.name: supplier_id
columns.column_description: ID of the supplier handling the order

columns.name: shipping_region_id
columns.column_description: ID of the region where the order is to be delivered

columns.name: product_id
columns.column_description: ID of the product ordered

columns.name: ordered_quantity
columns.column_description: Quantity of the product ordered

columns.name: delivered_quantity
columns.column_description: Quantity of the product actually delivered

columns.name: delivery_status
columns.column_description: Current status of the delivery

columns.name: delay_reason
columns.column_description: Reason for delay if delivery is not on time

columns.name: tracking_id
columns.column_description: External tracking ID for the shipment

columns.name: is_on_time
columns.column_description: Indicates if the delivery was on or before promised date

columns.name: is_in_full
columns.column_description: Indicates if the ordered quantity was fully delivered

dbo.supplier_metadata_sample.table_description: Contains details about the various suppliers

columns.name: supplier_id
columns.column_description: Unique identifier for each supplier

columns.name: supplier_name
columns.column_description: Name of the supplier

columns.name: contact_person
columns.column_description: Main contact person at the supplier

columns.name: email
columns.column_description: Contact email of the supplier

columns.name: phone
columns.column_description: Contact phone number

columns.name: head_office_city
columns.column_description: City where the supplier's head office is located

columns.name: primary_region_id
columns.column_description: ID of the main operational region for the supplier

columns.name: contract_start_date
columns.column_description: Date when the contract with the supplier began

columns.name: contract_end_date
columns.column_description: Date when the contract with the supplier ends

columns.name: service_level_agreement_otif
columns.column_description: Contractually agreed On-Time In-Full (OTIF) percentage target

columns.name: avg_otif_qtr_current
columns.column_description: Average OTIF performance for the current quarter

columns.name: avg_otif_qtr_prev
columns.column_description: Average OTIF performance for the previous quarter

columns.name: risk_score
columns.column_description: Risk score from 1-10 (10 being high risk, e.g., financial stability)

columns.name: tier
columns.column_description: Supplier tier (e.g., 'Tier 1 Strategic', 'Tier 3 Backup')

columns.name: is_active
columns.column_description: Indicates if the supplier is currently active

dbo.weather_event_metadata_sample.table_description: Records significant weather events that could impact logistics

columns.name: event_id
columns.column_description: Unique identifier for each weather event

columns.name: region_id
columns.column_description: ID of the region affected by the weather event

columns.name: event_type
columns.column_description: Type of weather event (e.g., 'Heavy Rainfall', 'Cyclone')

columns.name: start_date
columns.column_description: Datewhen the weather event began

columns.name: end_date
columns.column_description: Date when the weather event ended (or is projected to end)

columns.name: severity
columns.column_description: Severity of the event ('Low', 'Medium', 'High')

columns.name: impact_description
columns.column_description: Detailed description of the event's impact
